name: image01.jpg
title: Inventory screenshot
description: Shows the inventory of a Barbarian Character, the item tooltip for a Helmet with 531 Item Power, 664 Armor and various other stats. The helmet requires level 40, also visible is the healthbar and potion count

name: image02.png
title: Login Screen
description: Shows the character selection screen of Diablo 4, a level 20 Barbarian character is selected and the account shows 3 more characters, level 17 and 20 named Lightning a Sorcerer, Zkatos a druid and another Barbarian Zkatos level 17. Also shows the Realm selection set to World Tier 2
